summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2118, for the improvement of Ninth Avenue South, from the north margin of Stacy Street to Seattle Boulevard, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by replanking the existing bridge to a width of twenty (20) feet with five (5) inch planks; under Ordinance No. 21212, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
